downloadTitle: Quick reference guide - SharePoint Server 2016 databases
downloadDescription: Poster shows the databases that support SharePoint Server 2016.
detailsSection: Download this poster to use as a quick reference guide to the databases that support SharePoint Server 2016. Each database has information about the size, scaling guidance, I/O patterns, and any requirements.
systemRequirementsSection: • Depending on what file you download, one file is a Microsoft Visio file and the other is a Portable Document Format (PDF) file. Users who do not have Microsoft Visio can view the Visio file through the downloadable Visio 2016 Viewer. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: database types and descriptions in SharePoint Server 2016
